page.title: 10Family Life (contd.).
page.content: {Wendy's Day} When I get up at ten past seven on Friday morning,I dress and have my breakfast.I walk to school at quarter to nine.When the bell rings at nine o'clock I go to the classroom and do Language.Then I go out for a playtime at 10.40.I come back into the classroom at eleven o'clock,and then I do Maths until half past twelve.At half past twelve I have my dinner,and then go out for a playtime until half past one.When I come in at half past one,I read a book until our Art Teacher comes.When our Art Teacher comes,we do art until half past three.At half past three,I go home.I walk home,and I usually get home at twenty to four.I have my tea at half past four,and after tea I watch television until about ten o'clock,and then go to bed.
